dc_title_s: L'ancien et le nouveau Méxique, avec la Floride et la basse Louisiane: partie occidentale; par M. Bonne.
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Prime meridian: Paris, de Fer. Top margin: "Longitude du Méridien de l'Ille de Fer." Bottom margin: "Longitude du Méridien de Paris." In margin at upper right: 117. In margin at lower right: "Andre sculp." Rigobert Bonne's Atlas Supplement was publishedin Paris in 1787. 1 map: colored; 35 x 24 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Bonne, Rigobert, 1727-1794, cartographer.,Dahl, James, former owner.
